citation_details.title: Frequency tagging of syntactic structure or lexical properties; a registered MEG study
citation_details.author: E Kalenkovich, A Shestakova, N Kazanina
citation_details.abstract: A traditional view on sentence comprehension holds that the listener parses linguistic input  using hierarchical syntactic rules. Recently, physiological evidence for such a claim has
